column4: hello everyone-is it possible to remove the ubuntu desktop and all of the libraries? I'm currently using Kubuntu 8.04 and KDE4
a first step would be to remove libgnome, which will take a /lot/ of the gnome stuff with it as dependency
do I do that through the terminal?
synaptic... serach for all libgnome packages and check what they cause to be removed if you remove the lib-package
